flexibleContent.heading: Our full stack developers at Techtic are adept with the latest server tools.
Start your journey with our Full-stack development services that covers everything from designing, developing, testing, and maintaining developed and functioning web platforms.

contentLists.heading: Hire Skilled Resources or Team
contentLists.content: Hire Full-stack developers with diverse industry experience to build a feature-rich, responsive, and scalable web platform from the ground up in a record time.

contentLists.heading: Continuous upgradation
contentLists.content: Techtic’s Full-stack development service is all-inclusive and continuous improvements are the best part for your business never to miss any growth opportunity.

contentLists.heading: Easy Scalability Options
contentLists.content: At Techtic, you can quickly scale your Full-stack development team as your project grows or needs to accelerate time-to-market.

contentLists.heading: Developer replacement guarantee
contentLists.content: With a workforce of qualified and adept full-stack developers, we also offer cooperative developer replacements of your choice.

contentLists.heading: Strict NDA terms & IP security
contentLists.content: Whether you hire Mean stack developers or Full-stack, we ensure the security of project data or any confidential information through NDA terms.

contentLists.heading: Client Success Manager
contentLists.content: Techtic’s Client success manager is to ensure you get strong support throughout your Full-stack project development and bridge the gap between you and Full-stack remote developers.

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop Web Application?
contentLists.content: The development cost of Web Application is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop Web Application, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop my Web Application?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your web application and factors like features and functionalities you want to have in your web application development project. To precisely understand in-detail please, you can email us your Web Application Development project requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch with us today.

contentLists.heading: Will you replace my developer if I’m not satisfied with your developer?
contentLists.content: Every developer you hire will be chosen by you after assessing their profile, experience and expertise. However, in case it seems there are issues pertaining to developer performance or compatibility, we guarantee a replacement immediately ensuring the reason for replacement is addressed.

contentLists.heading: How do I communicate and give instructions to my hired developers?
contentLists.content: Communicating and sharing instructions with your remote team is simple. You can either email, Skype or Slack. We have a proper project management system to manage projects seamlessly. Also, you’ll be assigned a dedicated Account Manger who’ll make sure everything is in place.

contentLists.heading: Will the resource we procure by ‘hire a full stack developer’ engagement model work dedicatedly for us?
contentLists.content: Yes, any remote team member who works with you as part of the ‘hire a (dedicated) full stack developer’ will work exclusively on your projects till the contract period is over.

contentLists.heading: I’m a CTO and would like to handle a remote team on my own. Is it possible to hire full stack developer/team?
contentLists.content: Yes, you can hire as many qualified and experienced full stack developers or even an entire team as per your project requirement, and manage them remotely, as long your project needs. Techtic Solutions assure IP security, whereby developers here work in a secure environment within our infrastructure.

contentLists.heading: Which skills should a full stack developer ideally possess?
contentLists.content:
Along with strong communication skills that is integral to any remote projects, a full stack developer at Techtic is expected to fulfil certain criteria such as:

  • Application stack
  • An in-depth knowledge and experience of different web applications
  • Hosting experience (OS, website, various supporting systems)
  • Knowledge of both frontend (UX design and its instruments) and backend (different databases and frameworks) toolkits.

contentLists.heading: How to choose the right full stack developer?
contentLists.content: A competent full-stack developer will be knowledgeable of frontend and backend technologies that are required to build a functional website – MySQL, AngularJS, React JS, React Native, CSS, NodeJS, Laravel, PHP, HTML, Bootstrap, Magento, CMS, etc. Read More at How to choose the right full stack developer?
